title: Cheif Finance Officer (CFO)
responsibilities: Keep Information of the accounts of the org.
Helps members understand about current situation of finance.
powers: Able to decide where to utilize our money
Able to increase the collection money according to suitability
If any member has any idea to utilize the collected funds it must first be told to the CFO.

title: Cheif Communication Officer (CCO)
responsibilities: Communicate any decisions that took place in any meeting.
powers: Has information to any small thing that happens in the organization
Able to assign members to conduct a meeting in case of faliure of a single member.
Members should inform CCO in case of their absence in the meeting.

title: Cheif Innovations Officer (CIO)
responsibilities: Come up with ideas and innovations to make meetings interesting
powers: Able to assign members to work for any creative process.
Members have to get over the fear of shame for any innovative task assigned by CIO
